code: import React from"react";import close from"./close-icon.png";import"./Notifications.css";import{getLatestNotification}from"./utils";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";var Notifications=function Notifications(){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"Notifications",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{style:{position:"absolute",background:"transparent",border:"none",right:"20px"},"aria-label":"close",onClick:function onClick(){console.log("Close button has been clicked");},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:close,className:"close-btn",alt:"close"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"Here is the list of notifications"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("ul",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{"data-priority":"default",children:"New course available"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{"data-priority":"urgent",children:"New resume available"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{dangerouslySetInnerHTML:getLatestNotification()})]})]});};export default Notifications;
